name: Oh, Sheep!
description:
Hi guys! 

Our game name is Oh Sheep! and the main character is actually a cute sheep🐑  who tries to get over the obstacles while collecting coins.  We transposed our moral state into a funny game.

It's a game you'd usually play when you're bored and just want to relax, to cheer yourself up!! 

We are asking you to play our game and leave constructive feedback!!😊Thanks😊

Controls:

A-D /left and right arrows
